item.title: Food Delivery Doesn't Work
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Get better at Hacka(Data)-thons
item.description: Over the past week I participated in Hong Leong Bank’s(HLB) annual Can You Hack It 2020 Datathon, and managed a top 10 finish after pitching to a (digital) panel of C-suite and M.D. level judges. The experience was certainly eye-opening and very hard-earned, with my nearly throwing in the towel at multiple points throughout the event. I’d like to share a little on the event itself, the problem and my motivation towards the solution, and the lessons I’d be bringing into my next hackathon, which I hope would be useful to you, dear reader.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
